name: PowerCenter:Avoid creating identical Source Qualifiers
description: This metric lists source qualifiers having a similar source.
output:
This report lists all Mappings and Mapplets with source qualifiers which are duplicated
It provides the following information: Mapping or Mapplet full name, Source Qualifier full name and duplicated Source Qualifier name
rationale: it is unecessary to have several Source Qualifiers on a same source. Maintain them is harder and could lead unstability if  changes are made on some of them.
total: Total number of Mappings and Mapplets
